choices: The Predator (muscle growth, strength/height increase, possible futanari)
The Weapon of Mass Consumption (hard vore, eating, weight gain)
The Goddess of Beauty (body part growth, increasing beauty/possible height)
The Mastermind (intelligence increase, mind control, etc)
More choices/Change someone else/Custom
1.content:
Hanging the calendar back on her wall, Azu stood back and stared for a moment, deep in thought how to start the brand new month in the best way possible.
"Hmmm... September..." she sighed thoughtfully. "I wonder what could happen this month, and how I could improve on last month."
She looked over at the pile of empty fizzy drink bottles in the corner of her room, remembering her decision at the beginning of August to consume less fizzy drinks.
"Huh, maybe my willpower isn't up to much after all," she pondered. "I guess I could just play it by ear this month and see what happens," she mused defeatedly, sitting back down in her computer chair and basking in the glow of the screen for a few moments.

She gazed at the image on her screen: a busty, powerful, attractive young woman from a comic book, used as her desktop background. Azu had always wanted to be more influential to other people and to receive more attention, but her average looks and somewhat shy personality hadn't gotten her very far throughout school, and even after finishing school. She had admired guys and girls from her school before, wishing she could become closer to them and even fantasizing about some, but to this day and to her dismay, she remained an inexperienced virgin.

Suddenly, an intrusive beep brought her thinking to an end. The screen of her mobile phone lit up at the other side of the room, indicating a text message. Wearily, she rose from her seat to check it, assuming it was probably her mother noticing her bedroom light still on and telling her to go to bed already.

"Congratulations!", the title of the spam-esque text read. "You are the lucky member of the FreakyFetish forum site who has been chosen to test out our new beta app. BodyMod! Please use the app as you wish, usage data will automatically be sent to us for review on how to improve the app. However, please note that the app currently only works on women. Click here to download it and for more details!"

Azu was ready to hit delete before even finishing the first sentence, however she noticed it mentioned her subscription to her favourite forum site, making it seem more legitimate. Out of pure curiosity and boredom, she tapped the link provided with her thumb, and a notification came up on screen: "Now downloading 'BodyMod: Beta'".

"I wonder what this could possibly be about," she muttered under her breath, watching the progress bar reach 100%. "Probably some flash game where you can live out your fetishes, like I've played a million times before." She tapped the icon for the app, bringing up a rather plain, mostly text-based screen.
"Welcome to BodyMod!", it read, in large bold lettering. "We've already finished building your physical and mental profile, so all you need to do is select one of the presets below and you'll be on your way to becoming what you've always dreamed of! Please note, the transformations may take several days." Even more confused than before, Azu, swiped the screen down, revealing the options mentioned above."Is this thing supposed to actually change me in real life?" she pondered. "That's rich. Oh well, let's just have a look before I delete this thing."

"Option 1: The Predator!
Have you ever wanted to be more persuasive... physically? Ever wanted to teach that jerk a lesson the hard way? Do you hate your small, skinny, weak physique? Worry no more, because with this option, you'll be able to forcefully be anyone's object of affection, or even anyone's source of pure terror and pain depending on how you decide to use your newfound power..."

"Option 2: The Weapon of Mass Consumption!
Ever had a day where you just wanted to sit around and snack on things? Ever actually done that? It's fun, right? What if you could do that, but anything you could fit in your mouth is a delicious snack, and anything bigger is a meal? Not only this, but your appetite would never run out, and you could decide how much weight you put on, if any? If this sounds like fun, this option is for you!"

"Option 3: The Goddess of Beauty!
Do you look at swimsuit models and envy their curvy bodies? Do you look at makeup models and wish your face was as pretty as theirs? Wish no more, because with this option, you can choose your desired body type and figure, and make yourself as attractive as you like with literally no limit! Ever wanted to watch people kill each other just to be able to have a glimpse of you? Now you can!"

"Option 4; The Mastermind!
It's not all about appearance, right? Imagine if you were so sharp, you could solve any problem before it even existed, or convince anyone to do anything you wish? Ever wanted to manipulate space and time with merely your mind? Within this option lies infinite potential, and unprecedented power..."
1.title: A Fresh Start

choices: Azu wakes up, but the feeling is gone...
Azu wakes up feeling just as good...
Azu wakes up feeling even better...
Azu is awoken by something before morning comes...
Azu decides not to go to sleep just yet...
11.content:
With the same disinterested look plastered on her face, Azu tapped the first option without really thinking about it.
Suddenly, upon touching the screen, a chilling sensation from deep within Azu's body spread from her torso all the way out to her fingertips and her toes, causing her to shiver rather violently for a few moments. She stared at the screen with wide eyes for a few moments, wondering what the hell just happened.
"...The fuck was that?" she mumbled to herself, noticing the screen on the phone had changed from before.
"You've chosen Choice 1: The Predator!", it read in bold lettering. "Depending on your body type, you may or may not notice changes right away. Make sure you check back regularly to see any new updates, and to see your progress so far. Have fun!"

"...That's it?" Azu said aloud, turning her phone off and putting it on her desk. "I was kinda hoping for even just a stupid game to pass the time, but oh well."
She sat down on the side of her bed, noticing a strange feeling of fullness within every part of her body. Unable to put her finger on it, she focused on the feeling for a while, trying to figure out what was going on. It wasn't like the feeling of fullness one experiences after eating too much, but instead a rather pleasing sensation of comfort and... satisfaction. It was especially strong in her arms, legs and chest, but was noticeable everywhere else too.

Smiling at this new, unexplained feeling, Azu laid down on her bed, not even bothering to change clothes or pull the cover over herself.
"I wonder if this is related to that app", she thought to herself. "If I feel this great in the morning, I'm gonna check it again for sure!"
Azu couldn't shake the feeling that it was all in her mind, however, and that this feeling was a result of wishful thinking, hoping the app would actually work. With a mixture of happy, cynical and slightly excited thoughts swirling in her head, she closed her eyes and let the relaxation take over, falling into a deep sleep in almost no time at all...
11.title: The Beginning of Something Huge... Really Huge

choices: Option 1: Hidden Power!
Option 2: Female Power!
Option 3: Limitless Power!
112.content:
For the first time in as long as she could remember, Azu woke to the sound of her alarm the next morning feeling completely conscious. Wide-eyed almost instantly, she suddenly remembered the events of last night. The pleasant feeling she fell asleep to was still just as present. To put it simply: Azu felt alive.
Usually, Azu would prefer to lie in bed for a short while before getting up, but this morning she had no such desire.
"Maybe this app really is the real deal...?" she pondered, as if her train of thought from last night was unbroken. Somewhat excitedly, she pulled her phone out from under her pillow, where she left it overnight to charge and to wake her up in the mornings. She instantly noticed a new notification from the app.

"New update! Tap here to continue your progress", the notification read.
Azu had "tapped here" before she'd even finished reading the text on the screen. The app quickly sprung to life, as if it was as excited as she was.
"Congratulations, you've already made progress since downloading BodyMod!", the new start screen read. "If you haven't taken a look in the mirror yet today, we invite you to do so now."
Without a second thought, Azu spun on her heel to look into the full-length mirror mounted on the wall behind her, threw her shirt across the room, and pulled down her trousers.
Her jaw nearly dropped.

Gone was the almost lanky form of Azu's body, looking slim but at the same time weak, fragile and unhealthy. Her ribcage was no longer even slightly visible. In place of these features that had haunted Azu for years were things much more pleasing to her eye.
Her stomach now looked firm and slightly toned, with just a hint of a crease in her skin, slightly showing her never-seen-before abs. Her torso had more shape, her waist appearing slightly narrower and her hips slightly wider. Moving down, her once stick-like legs now had noticeably thicker thighs with hints at the muscle beneath the skin, but still with an overall slim appearance.

What Azu was most stunned by, however was her arms. Before, her skinny arms looked frail, as if she could barely lift a couple of kilos, but now they looked strong. Certainly not bodybuilder-level strong, or even athlete-level strong, but there was definitely more bulge around her upper arms, and upon flexing them, Azu noticed them bulge ever so slightly more.

Stunned, Azu could not help but stand in front of the mirror, staring dumbly at herself with an open mouth. She looked stronger, she looked healthier, she looked bigger. She looked sexier, and she loved it.
With millions of possibilities flying through her head, Azu quickly went back into the app, and pressed "Continue" underneath the text.

"This is only the beginning of what BodyMod can do for you", the text read. "In fact, there are already more customisation options for you to choose from. To continue, please scroll down and make your choice."

"This is too cool..." Azu said aloud, her voice and hands shaking with excitement. Scrolling down as instructed, she realised she had a huge grin plastered on her face...

"Option 1: Hidden Power!
This option will allow you to continue to gain strength, with very little or no change to your current appearance. Surprise everyone by making them watch that skinny girl they know lift a car above her head with one arm!

Option 2: Female Power!
This option allows you to continue to gain muscle mass and strength as you just have, while retaining a desirable, curvy, feminine appearance. You'll be the perfect combination of beautiful and powerful!

Option 3: Limitless Power!
This option removes any limits or restrictions, and allows you to gain as much muscle as you like. You'll eventually appear large, chunky, intimidating, and bulging with muscle, and your physical strength will be unlimited in potential for improvement!

Please note: changes may take some time to take effect."
112.title: ...But just how huge, exactly?

choices: ...decides to hang out with Anita.
...decides to check out the app in more depth.
...decides to test her apparent new strength.
1123.content:
"Well, if I'm gonna do this, I might as well do it properly", Azu said, tapping the third option. However, to her disappointment, there was no sudden sensation like last time, instead only a new screen that popped up.
"Your progress", the screen was titled. Scrolling down, Azu noticed some more information below.

Your basic stats before and after BodyMod
Before
Height: 5'6
Weight: 98 lbs
You can lift: 50 lbs

After
Height: 5'6
Weight: 120 lbs
You can lift: 100 lbs

If you would ever like to see how well you're doing, check this page again! Also keep an eye out for fine-tuning customisation options.

Trying not to crush the phone in her palm with excitement, Azu silently closed the app. She'd always dreamed about being strong, powerful, and intimidating, and it was starting to look as though this app could fulfil her dream. Every night, she'd check the Freaky Fetish Forum site to see if anyone had posted any new content depicting massive, muscular women displaying acts of strength and power. But who needs those images and stories when you can just look in the mirror?

"I-I've already gained that much weight? I can't believe this is actually working..." Azu mumbled aloud, her voice still shaking. Picking up her shirt and trousers from the floor, she got dressed again, noticing they were slightly tighter fitting than usual.
A quick poke of her head around her door indicated that nobody else was currently home, so Azu walked straight into the bathroom, stripped down again, and stood on the scales, just to be sure.
"121 lbs?" she pondered, not knowing whether to be confused or delighted. "Either these scales are a little off, or I've already 'progressed' some more."
Whipping her phone out of her pocket once again, a quick check confirmed her suspicions.

Height: 5'6
Weight: 121 lbs
You can lift: 104 lbs

That was all the proof Azu needed. She could apparently lift more than twice the weight she could this time yesterday evening, and the number was ever-so-slowly increasing. Thoughts quickly began to fill her head about how she could be the she-hulk she'd always dreamed of in almost no time at all. The mere thought of such a thing was getting her excited.
Unsure what exactly to do with herself now she had this newfound excitement building up, Azu...
1123.title: Read the Chapter, Not the Chapter Titles

choices: Anita looks up and greets Azu, seemingly oblivious to her changes...
Anita looks up and is suddenly shocked by Azu's new look...
11231.content:
The first thing that came to Azu's mind was her best friend since kindergarten: Anita. She already had plans to meet up with Anita today, which she'd totally forgotten until now thanks to the sudden appearance of the app in her life. Now that she already had a noticeably fuller figure, Azu was positively brimming with excitement to see if Anita would notice or be envious.

"Damn, I might finally be able to have a body as nice as Anita's!" Azu said to herself excitedly. Still standing on the bathroom scales, she flexed both arms in a classic bodybuilder's pose while looking in the mirror, noticing the sleeves of her t-shirt tightening ever so slightly around her arms as she did so. Unfortunately the growth was not fast enough for Azu to notice while she took a few moments to stare into the mirror, but that made it all the more exciting to her to check up on the app every so often.

Stepping off the scales, Azu unlocked her phone and dialed Anita's number, trying to control her breathing so she wouldn't sound too excited to her friend. Just a few moments passed before Anita picked up, as if she was awaiting the call.
"Hey, Azu! What's up?", the cheery voice on the other end of the phone chirped.
"Hi, Neet!" Azu replied, trying to sound calm and casual by using her friend's affectionate nickname. "Just checking if you're still cool with meeting at the mall in about an hour? I've gotta shower first, but I'm down if you are."
"Of course, silly! I'd never keep you waiting!" Anita laughed. "I'll be waiting by the main entrance, probably with a coffee. See you in a while, honey!"
Azu quickly said goodbye before hanging up and tossing the phone to one side. She had decided that a quick shower was in order, just in case.

one rushed shower later...


As she finished blow-drying her hair, Azu looked in the mirror one last time before putting her t-shirt back on. She couldn't notice any difference visually since she woke up, but the feeling of satisfaction from before was still very much there. She couldn't help but smile and hum to herself as she pulled the shirt over her head and the trousers up her legs. "Was I always this positive and happy?" she thought to herself as she hurried downstairs to put her shoes on. "Maybe all I needed to do was tone up a little."

Luckily for Azu, the bus station was situated just across the street from her, so she didn't have to wait for long before one showed up.
Azu looked at her phone with a mixture of excitement and nervousness. The time was 10:55am, and she had agreed to meet Anita at 11. "Only a few more minutes until the bus arrives at the mall," she thought to herself, trying to control her shaking. She looked around at the other people on the bus. No one seemed to be looking at her.
"Phew, I guess I don't look too suspicious," she concluded silently. "But I think I'll check the app one last time before I arrive."

Her hands trembling with anticipation, Azu unlocked her phone and opened the app. There were no new notifications from it as there were before, but something may have changed anyway, she thought.
Once the app had loaded, she tapped the "Stats" button to confirm her suspicions:

Height: 5'7
Weight: 123 lbs
You can lift: 112 lbs

Azu closed the app straight away to avoid any nosey bus-goers catching a glimpse. A shiver of excitement flowed through her body, and she had to fight the urge to laugh.
"I can't believe it," she thought to herself. "I've changed even more just since I left the house!"
She pocketed her phone just in time for the bus to pull up outside the mall's main entrance. She looked out the window to see Anita waiting there as promised, holding an iced coffee and looking down at her phone patiently.
Azu stood up from her seat a few moments before the bus stopped completely, still noticing her normally loose fitting clothes being on the tighter side now. "Hopefully I won't have to buy new clothes by the end of today," she pondered.
Azu reached for the handrail on the steps of the bus, noting how much more excited she was than usual to meet up with Anita. As she stepped off, she waved to get the attention of her friend and called her name.

"Neet!" she shouted cheerfully. "How's the coffee?"
11231.title: First Journey

choices: Azu goes with Anita to buy some bigger clothes...
First, Azu excuses herself to use the toilets to secretly check her phone...
112312.content:
The moment she heard the voice of her friend, Anita looked up from her phone. Her eyes suddenly widened to the size of dinner plates when she saw Azu strolling casually towards her.
"Holy shit, Azu!?" she yelped excitedly. Oblivious to the fact she'd just dropped her almost empty coffee, she bounded over to Azu, stopping inches away from her and staring into her eyes with awe. "You look so different!" she continued at the same loud volume, causing Azu to flinch a little.
"Good to see you too, Neet!" Azu replied sarcastically. "I'm glad you've missed me over the last few days."
Anita blinked in disbelief several times, still staring as if she hadn't heard what her friend had just said. "Have you been working out?"
"No, nothing like that," Azu replied dismissively, trying desperately to keep her cool. "Holy shit, is this tiny difference really so noticeable!?" she thought to herself.
"I've been on a bit of a diet lately, but nothing too extreme," she continued.
"I can't believe it..." Anita gasped, almost in a daze, her behaviour over the top as usual.

Azu stepped back from her friend for a moment. Amidst all the ruckus they were causing, a few people were looking suspiciously in their direction.
"Shit, don't want to be the center of attention too much", she decided in her head. This wasn't the only thing bugging her, however. She wasn't sure if it was the excitement of meeting her friend or the changes slowly taking place, but her shirt was starting to feel on the uncomfortable side of tight. Looking down, the t-shirt was especially tight around her chest and her upper arms. Thankfully, being a t-shirt, her lower arms were allowed room to breathe for now. Azu couldn't help but admire how much meatier her arms looked than yesterday, even if it was't the most dramatic change in the world.

Apparently, Azu wasn't the only one admiring this, as moments later Anita reached out to tentatively touch her upper arm.
"Wow..." she sighed, with a sparkle in her eyes. "Are you sure you haven't been working out, Azu?" she probed.
"Haha, nope, not any more than usual!" Azu replied with a nervous chuckle. "I guess eating a little better makes a big difference!"
"Hmmmm....." Anita stepped back for a moment, clearly not entirely convinced. "Well, it could be that." she concluded, sounding almost resigned. "But whatever it is, you need new clothes! Your jeans are super tight fitting now!"

Her interest piqued, Azu looked down at her legs to confirm Anita's comments. She was right; her legs now appeared slightly longer than she remembered, and thicker too.
"In fact..."
Azu took a few thoughtful steps forward, noticing an unusual sensation she hadn't felt before. Her thighs rubbing together.
Oh my god, Anita is right! They're touching now! she squeed internally. Had the growth process suddenly sped up a little? Or had more time passed than it seemed? Azu was dying to take a look at her phone to check her stats, but she didn't want Anita to see the app... at least not just yet. She loved the feeling of power that was slowly increasing by the hour, and wasn't ready to share it with anyone else yet.

"Wow, I guess you're right," Azu replied, trying her best to sound shocked. "Well, any excuse for clothes shopping is a good one, right?"
"You know me too well!" Anita squealed, clapping her hands excitedly. "Let's go!"
112312.title: Realisation

choices: Press the button. I want to grow!
Leave it for now, I don't want to be found out.
1123122.content:
Before she could respond, Azu's train of thought was cut short by a short vibration in the pocket of her jeans. Her mind immediately went to the app, thinking it could be a notification or some similar thing. She could feel the excitement rising in her chest.
"Azu, are you alright?" Anita asked, in a quieter tone of voice. Azu noticed she was staring at her intently with a tilted head.
Crap, I must have look suspicious, Azu thought to herself.
"U-um, yeah, I'm fine!" she forced out, with an awkward chuckle. "I just need to, uh, use the bathroom first." She could feel beads of sweat forming on her forehead as she tried to act naturally towards her friend.
Anita stared into Azu's eyes for a few moments, unblinking and with the intensity of freezing cold daggers. She'd always had a habit of doing this, and it was as endearing to Azu as it was slightly unnerving.
"Alright, no prob. I'll wait here!" Anita suddenly chirped, reverting back to her usual grin and standing up straight.
Azu breathed a silent sigh of relief, nodding to her friend in quick acknowledgement as she turned to make her way to the bathrooms, hurrying to give the impression of urgency.

Slamming the cubicle door behind her and locking it frantically, Azu whipped her phone out from her back pocket. Her heart was racing in anticipation as she leaned against the cubicle wall and unlocked the phone. Sure enough, the vibration was from the app creating a notification.
Her finger trembling and her breathing heavy, Azu tapped the notification without even bothering to read it. The app loaded up fairly quickly, and the information Azu was dying to see came up on screen:

Height: 5'8
Weight: 131 lbs
You can lift: 145 lbs

"Oh my god..." Azu stuttered under her breath. She held out her arms, noticing the fabric of the t-shirt starting to stretch a little over her upper arms. Her lower arms were also starting to look less like noodles and noticeably meatier. Azu wasn't sure, but she could almost swear her hands even looked a little less dainty than the day before.
This is happening faster than I thought, Azu thought to herself, her head spinning a little. What if someone notices?
But at the same time, Azu couldn't help but love the feeling of power growing in her with every passing minute.
Looking down at her phone again, Azu noticed the stats had already increased a little more.

Height: 5'8
Weight: 132 lbs
You can lift: 146 lbs

Beyond this, there was a new area below the stats that Azu hadn't noticed in her daze. She quickly scrolled down to see what it was.
"Feeling impatient?" The new text probed. "We've just added a new feature that you might like. If you're not happy with your current rate of improvement, you can give yourself a little boost by hitting the button below! You can do this as many times and as often as you like, but we recommend using it sparingly to avoid drawing attention. Moreover, this feature is still in beta, and we have not fully tested the results of excessive use yet."

The aforementioned button was a fairly plain white rectangle with the word "Boost!" in the center. Azu stared at the button with tunnel-vision, mulling it over in her head.
I'd love to be bigger... she pondered, however I don't want to arouse any more suspicion from Anita or anyone else that I may have already done.
Her finger hovered hesitantly above the screen, as she tried to decide what course of action to take...
1123122.title: First, Azu excuses herself to use the toilets t...

choices: Azu decides to meet up with Anita again and show her the app...
Azu sneaks out of the bathroom and attempts to leave unnoticed...
Azu stays in the bathroom for now and checks out the new options...
11231221.content:
Her head spinning from excitement and anticipation, Azu decided to let her desires take over for once. Think now, act later, she thought to herself. She closed her eyes, took a deep breath, and planted her finger on the screen at the point it had just been hovering over.

Barely a moment passed before Azu began to notice the difference. The instant her finger made contact with the screen, she felt a chill starting at her fingertip and spreading through her whole body like a shiver, similar to when she first activated the app. This time, however, a dull ache enveloped her entire body too, making it slightly less pleasant than before. This feeling was amplified by the sensation of Azu's clothes beginning to tighten more and more against her skin.

Man, I don't know if I like this feeling, Azu pondered, her eyes still tightly squeezed shut. However, to her relief, the sensation ended as abruptly as it had started a short time later.
As excited as she was nervous and apprehensive, Azu slowly opened her eyes and straightened her back. Right away, she noticed the coat hook on the back of the cubicle door was somewhat lower than before. Her heart paused in her chest for a moment.
Azu held out her arms quickly as through trying to grab someone invisible before her. There was a small rip in the end of the sleeve on her right arm, and through the straining fabric she could see sharp definition and mass she had never seen before.
Breathless, Azu turned her gaze to her torso, immediately noticing her shirt hugging her meatier midriff much more tightly than before.

"Oh boy..." Azu exhaled deeply, trying to calm herself down a little. "Maybe I should get a closer look."
Azu calmly unlocked the cubicle door and stepped outside, noticing no one else in the bathroom. Her eyes widened instantly at the sight in the mirror immediately opposite.

Azu's shirt had come up at the hem, exposing a little of her midriff. She could clearly see creases that weren't there before, hinting at the beginnings of an impressive six-pack below the fabric.
Lower down, Azu noticed the bottoms of her jeans had similarly come some way up her leg, around halfway up her shin. Her calves and especially her thighs looked chunkier, harder, and well defined than ever before. The denim of her jeans looked as though it was stretched to almost its limit around her new, wider hips.

A hot flush of disbelief and excitement spread through Azu's entire body. She leaned against the cubicle door behind her for support as she reached into her back pocket to pull out her phone. I have to see the app, just so I know I'm not dreaming, she decided silently.

The app opened near instantly as if it was as excited as Azu to see the results. On the screen for Azu's instant gratification was the information she wanted to see:

Height: 6'0
Weight: 180 lbs
You can lift: 220 lbs

Azu felt as if the world had stopped around her as she read the results. At the mere push of a button, she was now among the tallest and strongest women she knew. This kind of control and power was unprecedented in Azu's life.
Swallowing hard and scrolling down, Azu noticed some additional options below the results in a new menu. These included "Change rate of growth", "Customize growth", the "Boost!" button from before, and various other things. Whoever was behind this app was certainly dedicated to it, Azu thought.

"Shit... what do I do now!?" Azu grumbled to herself, still alone in the bathroom. Reality had suddenly hit her. There's no way Anita wouldn't notice the difference if Azu went back to her now. She faced several choices in her head: Go back to Anita and own up, sneak out of the bathrooms and avoid her, or hide in here for the time being?
11231221.title: Impatience

choices: Absorb traits
Keep looking
112312213.content:
Azu was panicking. She could feel the fabric of her clothes being stretched with each passing second. Azu quickly realized that with the clothing stores on the opposite side of the mall that she would never be able to get a new set of clothes much less a new wardrobe before she broke free from her old clothes and was naked. So that ruled against trying to sneak out of the mall. It also meant that she could not spend the day with Anita anymore. So the only logical conclusion was to stay in the bathroom stall for the time being.

Azu then decided if she was not going anywhere for awhile that she should look at the new options from the bodymod app. First she texted Anita "Sorry girl feeling sick and throwing up. Catch you later." Seconds later she got the reply of "Oh so sorry feel better."

Azu laughed at this. "Oh I do feel better Anita." Just as Azu went to put her phone away her clothes finally lost the battle to cover her body and Azu looked at the bodymod app again:

Height- 6 foot 7
Weight- 245 LBS
You can lift- 325 LBS.

Azu looked at the screen again in wonder. Azu had never imagined this was possible. Now though rather then enjoying her body she was locked in bathroom stall. Azu sighed and looked back at the bodymod app and saw some of the other features the customize growth, boost option she had already used, and the change rate of growth. Azu quickly realized the change rate of growth had to be done if she had any prayer of getting home.

Azu picked that option and saw she could stop getting taller and putting on weight but could continue to get stronger. Those options were in the center of each bar. With that Azu moved the height and weight bars to the far left and the strength bar to the right. Azu then hit apply. After a minute she looked at the bodymod app again and gasped:
Height: 6 foot 8
Weight: 250 LBS
You can lift 750 LBS no 780, no 800.

Azu muttered to herself "How strong can I get?" With that she looked at some new options to play with
112312213.title: Azu stays in the bathroom for now and checks ou...

choices: Sleep and wait til Morning
Test the App on Herself
Add another Family Member to the App
Add a Friend to the App
Something Else?
12.content:
Azu looked over the options with very little emotion. The only option that caught Azu's attention was 'Option 2', another failing last month resolution it seemed tempting to allow herself to indulge in the foods and drinks that she would attempt to avoid. With a sarcastic laugh, Azu pushes 'Option 2' causing the app to load. Above the loading bar, the words 'Azu Body Syncing' faded in and out, giving Azu an uneasy feeling. When the app finished loading a detailed polygon mesh of human female appeared with Azu's name and weight(119 pounds) above it and button labeled 'Fat Settings' at the bottom of the screen. She on presses on settings, a menu pops up over the polygon mesh with multiple items. Among the menu items, there was a setting that controlled how much weight you would gain, Azu presses it and immediately sets it to zero pounds. As Azu looks through the app more and more she begins to fascinate with it, but soon she felt foolish getting interested in the strange app.

“If only this thing really worked for real,” mumbled Azu in a low voice while rolling her eyes.


Hesitant, Azu wanted to test the app but didn’t want to seem superstitious, she felt a weird vibe from her phone. After little thought, Azu got over her hesitation and pondered how to test it. Her thoughts were interrupted when she heard her mother’s footstep coming down the hall. Azu’s mother had recently started snacking at midnight then complain about how fat she was getting the next day, which annoyed Azu. Azu huffed, hearing her mother in the kitchen looking for food then back to bed.

“And tomorrow we’ll hear all about how fat she is, when she isn’t really fat at all, it’s like she wants to be fat,” Azu thought.


Azu got an awful idea. At the bottom of the menu, there was an item that allows new profiles to be added. Azu decides to add her mother and test the app on her. Azu enters her mother’s name and a loading bar appears with the word ‘Sandy Body Syncing’ fading in and out. When the loading was complete a polygon mesh of a chubby woman with Azu’s mother name and weight(163) appeared. Azu goes to the menu for her mother’s body and presses the weight gain control item. She set the app to make her mother gain 10 pounds every hour.

“I’ll give you something to complain about,” sniggered a sleepy Azu.


After a few seconds of sitting in the dark Azu wonders what to do next.
12.title: The Weapon of Mass Consumption

choices: Talk to Her Mother
Fix the "Problem"
Something Else?
121.content:
After some thought, Azu felt embarrassed for believing the app would do anything. She sat her phone on the nightstand, plugging the charger into it. As Azu gets into her routine sleep position she wonders what would happen if the app did work. The idea kept racing through Azu’s mind till she fell asleep.

         Azu’s Parent’s Bedroom: Sunday, 7:00 am
Azu’s father, Dai and her mother Sandy were sound asleep in bed until their alarm clock went off, disturbing their slumber. Sandy was the first to wake and the first to notice what has happened to her body. Sandy sits up and lets out a loud gasp, waking Dai.

“What the matter,?” ask Dai fully awake.

“I’m huge!” answered Sandy slightly panicked.

“Woah! I thought it would take more time for you to plump up like this,” said Dai comforting his wife with belly rubs.

“I knew when we got into feederism I would gain weight, but this is ridiculous,” said Sandy pushing on her fatten thighs.

“Well you have been eating more lately, maybe it’s finally caught up to ya,” said Dai trying to defuse the situation.

“I don’t know, but you’re right about one thing I look good fat,” said Sandy calming down.

“Good enough to eat,” said Dai leaning in for a kiss.


What started out as simply ‘good morning kiss’ soon turned into passion. Dai explored Sandy new body, feeling every soft part of her body. Sandy enjoyed the feel of her husband sinking deep into her doughy body. The two were interlocked and inseparable.

Two months ago Dai and Sandy wanted to spice up their marriage by indulging in a new kink. Dai introduced feederism to Sandy, a fetish she was unfamiliar with but quickly gain interest in. Sandy love the idea of stuffing herself silly, eating whatever she wanted and after gaining 10 pounds last month she became hooked. With every pound, Sandy would feel more and more exquisite. But the couple did face a complication, despite Sandy’s age(44) she still had a fast metabolism making it somewhat difficult to gain weight. Sandy had tried numerous methods to gain from calories heavy shakes, to snacking between meals and most recently midnight feasts. So waking up fatter was a treat for both Dai and Sandy.

         Azu’s Room: Sunday, 9:30 am
By this time Azu had completed her morning routine and was fully clothed. As Azu walks out of her room she grabs her phone and places it in her pocket, forgetting about the app. Azu heads to the kitchen and makes herself a sandwich, as she prepares her meal her mother calls to her from the next room.

“Azu is that you,” asked Sandy yelling from the next.

“Yeah Mom,” answered Azu.

“Well it’s about time you got up, can’t sleep your life away,” said Sandy in a playful tune.


Azu rolls her eyes at her mother’s comment and doesn’t reply. While Azu was eating her sandwich she could hear heavy breathing. As the sound of the heavy breathing came closer Azu began to hear loud footsteps. Before Azu could investigate the noises the source, Sandy, of the sounds comes through the doorway. Sandy stands in the doorway wearing nothing but a bra and panties under a blue translucent nightgown. Eyes widen in shock, Azu stares at her mother who was almost 100 pounds heavier than yesterday. Azu looks her mother up and down noticing how tight her outfit was, her mother’s underwear sunk deep in her fat rolls while the nightgown that once loosely hung past her mother’s knees were now being sketched by her fatten hips and bulging belly. Sandy notices Azu’s expression.

“I know, I know I’m a bit underdressed but this was the only thing that would fit me; your father is getting me new clothes as we speak,” said Sandy looking down at her outfit.

“THAT’S Not the problem! You got FAT!” yelled Azu in panic.

“Oh! Well yes, I’d gain few pounds here and there but that’s no cause for alarm”, replied Sandy feeling insulted.

“I’m sorry, I was just caught off guard; are you feeling alright?”, ask Azu

“I feel grea... no, Amazing is a better word to describe how I’m feeling today!” replied Sandy with a smile on her face.


Scared, Azu excuses herself and leaves the room. Azu realized what has happened and pulls out her phone. She immediately goes to the app, looking at her mother’s profile. She was shocked to find that her mother had gained 90 pounds since last night. 10:00 am, now it was 100 pounds.

Azu became confess, wondering what to do next. She felt guilty about purposely fattening her mother but her mother almost seemed happy being fat. What was Azu to do?
121.title: The Waking and Fattening

choices: Help her Mother get Fatter
Try the App on Herself or Someone Else
Something Else?
1211.content:
Azu stands in the hall debating her next actions. Azu thought that using the app to change her mother back to her former weight would only cause more confession, so she decides to question her mother instead. Azu enters the kitchen and finds her mother snacking on doughnuts. Azu looks over her mother, wondering why she wasn’t concerned about her weight despite being well aware of how fat she’d gotten.

“Mom, aren’t you worried about your weight?” asked Azu trying to find her emotions.

“Well you know, I’m old so weight gain is normal for someone my age,” answered Sandy pulling out another box of doughnuts.

“I know but you seem to be gaining a lot lately,” replied Azu trying not to make it sound like it was all her mother’s fault.

“Um… Well,” Sandy was lost for words.
She had hope that no one would approach her about her weight gain and could just play it off, but she could hear the concern in her daughter’s voice. After a long exhale Sandy chooses to tell her daughter the truth.
“I’ll level with you, I, like, being fat,” said Sandy with hesitation.

“You What?!” replied Azu more confused than before.

“I know it’s weird, but it makes me feel so alive and sexy!” said Sandy with pride in her voice.

“Does Dad know about this?” asked Azu.

“He’s in full support,” replied Sandy.

“Wow, OK, well if it makes you happy,” said Azu feeling a huge weight being lifted off her shoulders.


Azu creates another excuse to leave the kitchen again and heads back to her room. She was little dumbfounded by the whole conversation but didn’t much more thought into it, if her mother was happy she was happy. Azu pulls up the app and wonders how anyone could enjoy being fat.
1211.title: Talk to Her Mother

choices: Azu wakes up in the morning and checks the app...
Azu wakes up in the morning to an already noticeable difference...
Something wakes Azu up during the night...
Azu wakes up in the morning to no difference at all...
Azu decides not to go to sleep yet...
13.content:
Azu stared long and hard at the screen in consideration, thinking far too much about something she believed was a hoax. All four of the options sounded tempting to her, but something in her subconscious kept drawing her eyes to option #3.
"I sure do like the sound of that," she mumbled sarcastically, reading the option's description once more. "Maybe with this obviously miraculous app, I'll finally be that girl all the guys daydream about."
Cynical thoughts filling her head, Azu extended her finger and tapped on the screen absentmindedly, completely unaware of what was about to unfold. As soon as her finger made contact with the screen, a powerful burst of energy leapt from somewhere within the phone coursed through Azu's body for a fraction of a second, causing her to recoil and drop the phone with a high-pitched yelp.

"The fuck was that?" Azu exclaimed breathlessly, wide-eyed and still holding out her hand as if her phone was in it. "Did something actually happen, or did this piece of crap finally break?"
Squatting down to retrieve her phone, Azu noticed the screen had gone completely black. Confused, she picked it up and turned it on, somewhat relieved to see it spring back to life, with the app still open from before.
"Congratulations!" the text on the screen read. "Some of your DNA has now been replaced, and you should start seeing changes very soon. Keep an eye on the app for future updates, such as more customized transformations, and progress reports on how your body has changed over time. Goodbye, and have fun!"

Noticing she was quietly reading the text aloud for unknown reasons, Azu tossed the phone onto her bed and collapsed into her computer chair, trying to process all that had just happened.
"Well, I don't feel any different," Azu pondered, looking down at her body. "I still don't really believe anything is going to happen, but what else could have caused my phone to suddenly zap me?" she said, continuing her monologue. "

Out the corner of her eye, Azu noticed the softly glowing digits of her alarm clock, notifying her of the time.
"Damn," she sighed, "It's already 3AM. Guess I should just call it a night and see what happens tomorrow..."
With that, she gave one last look at the woman on her screen, and turned off the monitor, throwing herself into bed without bothering to change her clothes...
13.title: Skeptical Yet Hopeful

info.brief_description: A new app allows you to change the bodies of you and your friends as you please...
info.description:
I've written a fair few GTS interactives before, so I decided to try something a little different, so here we go.

This story is about a girl named Azu. She's a 19 year old with fairly average looks and intelligence, and while she has a small circle of friends, she likes to spend a lot of time alone indulging in her favourite video games, comic books, and anime series. One ordinary day, Azu receives an email inviting her to be the first beta tester of a brand new mobile app called BodyMod, based on random selection of users on a fetish forum she visits. This app allows her to set modifications for her own body or mind, and do the same to other people. However, as the app is in beta, it is currently only functional on women.

That's the basic outline of the story, so...
Guidelines and Rules
-This is not a giantess story. I have other giantess interactives if that's what you're interested in. I just want to try something new.
-That said, a small amount of growth is permitted, but to accompany other body changes, and also let's keep it mini-GTS level, so around 15 - 20 feet tall at the very most.
-Muscle growth and body part growth is permitted.
-Weight gain is permitted.
-Vore is permitted, but since there are no giantesses or shrinking, it's more like cannibalism. If you'd like to describe it in graphic detail, go ahead.
-Sex is permitted, but not with minors. You can write about minors if you wish, but keep them out of situations where they're making sexual contact with others for obvious reasons.
-Futanari is permitted. If you don't know what this is, just Google it.
-Peeing is allowed (not my favourite, but I'll allow it) however scat is not, at least for now.
-Mind control is permitted.
-Feature absorption is permitted (for example, Azu being able to suck out other peoples muscle or intelligence, etc)
-The BodyMod app can only affect females.
-You may not kill Azu, but you can add and kill off other characters as you please, as long as you're following the rules.
-Basically, this story is about Azu enhancing her body/mind in any way she sees fit, and the bodies/minds of others too, using the BodyMod app.
-Please keep a female dominance theme throughout the story.
-I personally prefer slow growth/change, so I'm going to be writing mostly this. You can write fast growth/change if you want, but if possible please also add the option for a slow growth alternative.
-Any chapter not within these guidelines will be either edited or deleted, so please bear them in mind so that you don't end up wasting your time with a chapter I'll end up deleting anyway.
-Other than that, feel free to add and message me with any questions or suggestions about the story!

Characters
Azu Queens: See above for main description. She's 19 years old, 5'6 in height, on the skinny side, with brown eyes and light brown hair. Usually seen in a t-shirt and jeans.

Miki Queens: Azu's younger sister. 10 years old, she's annoying and bratty to Azu, but sweet and innocent towards her kind-hearted parents so that she gets what she wants. She has light blonde hair that is usually tied in pigtails, usually wears a dress, and is 4'8 in height.

Sandy Queens: Azu's mother. She is 44 years old, 5'7 in height, and a little chubby. She's very kind and usually buys Azu and Miki what they want so that they're happy, but as a result is somewhat of a pushover, especially when it comes to Miki. She's out of the house a lot, busy working as an IT systems manager in a large company.

Dai Queens: Azu's father. He's 43 years old and 5'11 in height, with a fairly normal build and appearance. He wears glasses and has brown hair, and while he is kindly and caring like his wife, he is also the voice of reason in the family and is not afraid to discipline Miki from time to time when she goes overboard. He invented a new type of computer database in his 30s, earning him a large amount of money, so he is currently retired and spends his time at home or partaking in hobbies.

Anita Myers: 19 years old and 5'7 tall, she's Azu's best friend and they hang out a lot to play video games and go to conventions. She is very bubbly and acts spontaneously, and also dresses unusually in mismatching colours or garments. She's very pretty, however, with feminine features, long black hair and a nice body, causing Azu to secretly fantasize about her sometimes.

Luke Waterman: 19 years old and 5'3 tall. He is good friends with Azu and Anita, but has a very youthful appearance for his age and is somewhat feminine in appearance, with long-ish dark brown hair. He spends a lot of time crossdressing as a hobby, resulting in Azu and Anita fawning over him because of his ability to look good in female clothing despite being male. He attends conventions with them like this sometimes, not always entirely of his own will.

Dimitri Aleksandrov: 20 years old, and 6'1 in height. He used to live in Russia, but moved at age 14. Handsome and masculine in appearance, both Azu and Anita are very interested in him. He looks a lot more intimidating than he actually is, and spends his spare time reading books and being unwittingly followed by Azu and Anita.

That's all of the main characters, but feel free to add more as you see fit. I may also add more to this list from time to time. Have fun with the story!
